#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <sstream>
#include <map>
#include <string>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

void decode(string &);
int main(){
  string input;
  int t;
  cin >> t;
  while (t > 0){
    
    cin >> input;
    decode (input);
    cout << input << endl;
    t--;
  }
  return 0;
}
 
void decode (string& input){
  short r = input.length();
  int i = 0,j;
  char k;
  while(r > 0){
    //cout << i << " " << input[i] << endl;
    if(input[i] == '1' || input[i] == '0'){
      //  cout << "in 1" << " " << endl;
      stringstream(input.substr(i,3)) >> j;
      k = j;
      input.replace(i,3,1,k);
      i = i + 1;
    
      r -= 3;
    }
    else{
      stringstream(input.substr(i,2)) >> j;
      // cout << input.substr(i,2) << " input string"<< endl;
      k = j;
    
      
      input.replace(i,2,1,k);

      i = i + 1;
      r -= 2;
    }
  }
  return;
}
